name: Draw.io (Desktop)
notes: Draw.io is a diagramming tool for creating flowcharts, diagrams, and other visuals.

name: Lucidchart Desktop
notes: Lucidchart Desktop is a powerful diagramming tool for creating flowcharts, org charts, and more.

name: Pencil Project
notes: Pencil Project is an open-source tool for creating mockups and diagrams.

name: Microsoft Visio
notes: Microsoft Visio is a well-known tool for creating professional diagrams and flowcharts.

name: Inkscape
notes: Inkscape is an open-source vector graphics editor, useful for creating diagrams and illustrations.

notes: yEd Graph Editor is a powerful desktop application for creating diagrams quickly and efficiently.

name: OmniGraffle
notes: OmniGraffle is a professional diagramming tool for macOS.
